name: BALANCE (itch) (ymbernon dada)
description:
The world is, was, will always be filled with good and evil, because good and evil is the yin and yang of the human condition.

Game:

Balance is a local multiplayer game, in which there are 2 characters; one represents yin and the other yang. Despite the differences, will you be able to overcome the obstacles?

Créditos:

this game was created by the students of the  Deià Escola d’Art i Disseny (2n de Grau Mitjà):

  • Elizaveta Stepanova
  • Óscar Cuesta
  • Dadà Ymbernon

with the collaboration of:

  • Deià Escola d’Art i Disseny
  • Institut Badia del Vallès
  • Ateneu de fabricació ciutat meridiana
  • Generalitat de Catalunya Departament d'Educació
  • Festival de Sitges 
  • Catskills
